name: Nightmares (itch) (Fallen)
description:
Join Conner as he traverses the depths of his nightmares.  Submission for the Minijam 114:Anime

Controls:
WASD - to move
Mouse and space - Interact

This game uses sounds from freesound:
https://freesound.org/people/maeiounj39/sounds/215050/
https://freesound.org/people/pheiland/sounds/202806/
